history.proof: intros A m. induction m. - left. reflexivity. - right. left. exists a, a0. reflexivity. - shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Set) (m : Map A), m = M0 A \/ (exists (a : ad) (x : A), m = M1 A a x) \/ (exists x y : Map A, m = M2 A x y)

Premises:
M1 : forall A : Type, ad -> A -> Map A
ad = N : Set
M0 : forall A : Type, Map A
M2 : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
in_M1_id : forall (A : Set) (a : A) (x : ad) (e : A), (exists c : ad, MapGet A (M1 A x e) c = Some a) -> a = e
in_M2_disj : forall (A : Set) (a : A) (m0 m1 : Map A), (exists c : ad, MapGet A (M2 A m0 m1) c = Some a) -> (exists c : ad, MapGet A m0 c = Some a) \/ (exists c : ad, MapGet A m1 c = Some a)
MapPut_semantics_3_1 : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), MapPut A (M2 A m m') a y = (if N.odd a then M2 A m (MapPut A m' (N.div2 a) y) else M2 A (MapPut A m (N.div2 a) y) m')
MapPut_behind_semantics_3_1 : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), MapPut_behind A (M2 A m m') a y = (if N.odd a then M2 A m (MapPut_behind A m' (N.div2 a) y) else M2 A (MapPut_behind A m (N.div2 a) y) m')
MapPut_behind_as_Merge_c : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), MapPut_behind A m a y = MapMerge A (M1 A a y) m
MapPut_as_Merge_c : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), MapPut A m a y = MapMerge A m (M1 A a y)
MapPut_behind_canon : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), mapcanon A (MapPut_behind A m a y)
MapPut_canon : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), mapcanon A (MapPut A m a y)
in_M0_false : forall (A : Set) (a : A), ~ (exists e : ad, MapGet A (M0 A) e = Some a)
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Type), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Set), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
MapPut_as_Merge : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), eqmap A (MapPut A m a y) (MapMerge A m (M1 A a y))
MapPut_behind_as_Merge : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), eqmap A (MapPut_behind A m a y) (MapMerge A (M1 A a y) m)
MapRemove_as_RestrBy_c : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall (a : ad) (y : B), MapRemove A m a = MapDomRestrBy A B m (M1 B a y)
MapSweep_semantics_2 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), MapSweep A f m = Some (a, y) -> MapGet A m a = Some y
MapDelta_nilpotent_c : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> MapDelta A m m = M0 A
MapDisjoint_empty_c : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> MapDisjoint A A m m -> m = M0 A
MapEmptyp_complete : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), MapEmptyp A m = true -> m = M0 A
MapGet_M2_bit_0_2 : forall (A : Type) (m m' m'' : Map A) (a : ad), MapGet A (if N.odd a then M2 A m m' else M2 A m' m'') a = MapGet A m' (N.div2 a)
MapGet_M2_bit_0_0 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad), N.odd a = false -> forall m m' : Map A, MapGet A (M2 A m m') a = MapGet A m (N.div2 a)
MapSweep_semantics_1 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), MapSweep A f m = Some (a, y) -> f a y = true
MapDisjoint_M1_conv_l : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : B), in_dom A a m = false -> MapDisjoint B A (M1 B a y) m
MapDisjoint_M1_l : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : B), MapDisjoint B A (M1 B a y) m -> in_dom A a m = false
MapDisjoint_M1_r : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : B), MapDisjoint A B m (M1 B a y) -> in_dom A a m = false
MapDisjoint_M1_conv_r : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : B), in_dom A a m = false -> MapDisjoint A B m (M1 B a y)
MapPut_semantics : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), eqm A (MapGet A (MapPut A m a y)) (fun a' : ad => if (a =? a')%N then Some y else MapGet A m a')
N.eqb_sym : forall x y : N, (x =? y)%N = (y =? x)%N
MapDom_Split_3_c : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map A) (m' : Map B), mapcanon A m -> MapDomRestrTo A A (MapDomRestrTo A B m m') (MapDomRestrBy A B m m') = M0 A
MapGet_M2_bit_0_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad), N.odd a = true -> forall m m' : Map A, MapGet A (M2 A m m') a = MapGet A m' (N.div2 a)
MapSubset_c_1 : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map A) (m' : Map B), mapcanon A m -> MapSubset A B m m' -> MapDomRestrBy A B m m' = M0 A
MapSubset_c_2 : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map A) (m' : Map B), MapDomRestrBy A B m m' = M0 A -> MapSubset A B m m'
MapDomRestrTo_m_empty_1 : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map A), MapDomRestrTo A B m (M0 B) = M0 A
MapRemove_as_RestrBy : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : B), eqmap A (MapRemove A m a) (MapDomRestrBy A B m (M1 B a y))
MapDomRestrTo_idempotent_c : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> MapDomRestrTo A A m m = m
MapRemove_canon : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall a : ad, mapcanon A (MapRemove A m a)
MapDomRestrTo_empty_m_1 : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map B), MapDomRestrTo A B (M0 A) m = M0 A
MapDomRestrBy_empty_m_1 : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map B), MapDomRestrBy A B (M0 A) m = M0 A
mapcanon_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (y : A), P (M1 A a y)) -> (forall m1 m2 : Map A, mapcanon A m1 -> P m1 -> mapcanon A m2 -> P m2 -> 2 <= MapCard A (M2 A m1 m2) -> P (M2 A m1 m2)) -> forall m : Map A, mapcanon A m -> P m
MapDomRestrTo_idempotent : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), eqmap A (MapDomRestrTo A A m m) m

```  
intros A m.
induction m.
- left. reflexivity.
- right. left. exists a, a0. reflexivity.
```

original: intros A m. induction m. - left. reflexivity. - right. left. exists a, a0. reflexivity.
